com.eep.taxe.models

Class Metal

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.eep.taxe.models.Resource
      • com.eep.taxe.models.Spendable
        • com.eep.taxe.models.Metal
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ResourceInterface, java.io.Serializable

    public class Metal
extends Spendable
    Represents the Gold of a player. Please note that being a Spendable, this also has a quantity. In fact, each player only has a single Gold instance. The quantity is stored as a property - see 'Spendable' for the quantity methods. This object implements the Comparable interface, so it can easily be compared to another Metal object using the Gold.compareTo(Metal) method.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
